column4: Can anyone please help me? I've tried many thing but nothing seems to work. When I try to login, all I get is a blank screen. mouse cursor moves though. And I can login to gnome in failsafe mode. (current situation) ...ANYONE?
?dm will do gdm/kdm/xdm, depending on what's there. ? is a single-character metacharacter.
oh, thanks. But it does not work. :(
